short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 123Movies - Download Movies Or Stream Movies From IMDb With 123Movies Movies App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the 123Movies browser extension for Chrome, Edge, Opera & Firefox, users can watch or download movies while visiting the IMDB, which is the worlds largest movie database. 

123Movies injects streaming and download buttons into each movie page & tv show page, allowing you to directly stream & watch almost any Hollywood movie or tv show you want. Watch or download movies ad-free with the 123Movies browser extension and don't forget to check out the 123Movies Android app.
